snippet: Prosecutors in Morelos State said the victims, ages 14 to 21, were found Thursday in plastic bags along with a threatening note from a drug gang.
abstract: Bodies of four youths are found in plastic bags in Cuernavaca, Mexico, along with a threatening note from a drug gang.
lead_paragraph: Prosecutors in Morelos State said the victims, ages 14 to 21, were found Thursday in plastic bags along with a threatening note from a drug gang.

headline.main: Mexico: 4 Killed in Birthplace of Victims’ Movement
headline.print_headline: Mexico: 4 Killed in Birthplace of Victims’ Movement
